html:
Orca Security Inc, a provider of instant-on, workload-level security for AWS, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud Platform, has acquired RapidSec Ltd, offers a software-as-a-service platform designed to provide rapid web security in a self-service manner. Both companies involved in the transaction are based in the US

Shai Alon is the CEO and Co-founder of RapidSec.

Deal In Brief

Deal TypeAcquisition
Sub-Category100% Acquisition
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-01-19

Deal Participants

Target (Company)RapidSec Ltd.
Acquirer (Company)Orca Security Ltd

Deal Rationale

% Acquisition100%
